properties.Name: FollowupCollectionActivity
properties.Description:
A categorization follow-up collection activities based upon common characteristics or functions performed.

Each of the specific collection activities directed at a Customer may require additional (follow-up) collection activities to be specified.   

The follow-up activity indicated should trigger one of the following collection activities or a management decisions:

(1)  Personal Contact
(2)  Telephone Call
(3)  Collection Letter
(4)  Close Account
(5)  Freeze Account
(6)  Refer to third party collection agency
(7)  Refer for legal action

Columns.Name: FollowupCollectionActivityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Followup Collection Activity.

Columns.Name: FollowupCollectionActivityName
Columns.Description: The name of a Followup Collection Activity Type.

Columns.Name: FollowupCollectionActivityDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Followup Collection Activity Type.
